ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Ulysses URAP RAR Peak 10-min Electric Field Data
ResourceHeader.Description: This set of RAR (Radio Astronomy Receiver) data from the Ulysses URAP (Unified Radio and Plasma Waves) experiment contains averages of the peak electric field intensities in 10-minute intervals via CDAWeb. The frequency spectra are determined from measurements on the X antenna of the URAP instrument in units of microvolt/Hz^0.5 for the frequency channel from 1.25 - 940.0 kHz.

AccessURL.Name: FTP access to CDFs at SPDF
AccessURL.Description: For ftp downloads of CDF formatted data from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from CDAWeb
